page.title: 15Arts & Crafts/Housing-Wetton
page.content:
{Arts and Crafts} There appears to be a number of arts and crafts - knitting, painting, sewing, printing, signwriting, woodwork, beaten copperwork, tapestry. Some people do arts and crafts purely as a hobby, others have become semi-professional after selling their products to local shops.
{Houses in Wetton} In Wetton, houses are made of limestone. Most of the houses are big and old. They are roofed with both slate and tiles. Wetton houses have big gardens.
{Religions} The place of worship in Wetton is the church of England. The old Methodist Chapel has been converted into a bed and breakfast Guest House.
